posts.post_content:

The flavor is nifty: when the guard dies, the ghosts escape. I like it.

posts.post_content: Instead of seeing the flavor as ghosts escaping the mausoleum, I prefer thinking of it as the guard is possessed by another ghost. When it dies, both the guard's spirit and the intruding spirit are released.

posts.post_content: Not bad in limited, but sucks in constructed. I guess if you play it in a deck where you need to be able to sac lots of stuff (ie [ghost council of orzhova](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=ghost council of orzhova)), this card gives you a nice amount of three cards to sac. Still, many others do the same, and some do it better.
